metadata.title: CVE-2024-26595 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: mlxsw:spectrum_acl_tcam: Fix NULL pointer dereference in error path When callingmlxsw_sp_acl_tcam_region_destroy() from an error path after failing toattach the region to an ACL group, we hit a NULL pointer dereference upon'region->group->tcam' [1]. Fix by retrieving the 'tcam' pointer usingmlxsw_sp_acl_to_tcam(). [1] BUG: kernel NULL pointer dereference, address:0000000000000000 [...] RIP: 0010:mlxsw_sp_acl_tcam_region_destroy+0xa0/0xd0[...] Call Trace: mlxsw_sp_acl_tcam_vchunk_get+0x88b/0xa20mlxsw_sp_acl_tcam_ventry_add+0x25/0xe0 mlxsw_sp_acl_rule_add+0x47/0x240mlxsw_sp_flower_replace+0x1a9/0x1d0 tc_setup_cb_add+0xdc/0x1c0fl_hw_replace_filter+0x146/0x1f0 fl_change+0xc17/0x1360tc_new_tfilter+0x472/0xb90 rtnetlink_rcv_msg+0x313/0x3b0netlink_rcv_skb+0x58/0x100 netlink_unicast+0x244/0x390netlink_sendmsg+0x1e4/0x440 ____sys_sendmsg+0x164/0x260___sys_sendmsg+0x9a/0xe0 __sys_sendmsg+0x7a/0xc0 do_syscall_64+0x40/0xe0entry_SYSCALL_64_after_hwframe+0x63/0x6b

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-26595` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-41-generic - 6.5.0-41.41~22.04.2
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-41-generic - 6.5.0-41.41~22.04.2
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-41-generic-64k - 6.5.0-41.41~22.04.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-41-lowlatency - 6.5.0-41.41.1~22.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-41-lowlatency-64k - 6.5.0-41.41.1~22.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1024-oem - 6.5.0-1024.25
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1015-starfive - 6.5.0-1015.16~22.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1022-azure - 6.5.0-1022.23~22.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1022-gcp - 6.5.0-1022.24~22.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1024-oracle - 6.5.0-1024.24~22.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1024-oracle-64k - 6.5.0-1024.24~22.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1021-nvidia - 6.5.0-1021.22
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1021-nvidia-64k - 6.5.0-1021.22
No subscription required
